alert.note: Alert for Bowman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 8:26PM CDT until June 29 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MDT FOR EASTERN BOWMAN COUNTY... At 726 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Scranton, or 16 miles southeast of Bowman, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Bowman, Scranton, Gascoyne, Bowman Haley Dam and Buffalo Springs. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
